description.narrative: The PDO of the Rwanda Public Sector Governance Program-for-Results operation is "to enhance Rwanda’s Public Financial Management and statistics systems to improve transparency and accountability in the use of public funds, revenue mobilization and the quality and accessibility of development data for decision making.".

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning

title.narrative: PDO Indicator 1: Tax to GDP ratio
IRI 3.1 Annual national agricultural survey conducted (nes/no)
IRI 2.3 Gap between annual budget and second year MTEF formulated previous year
IRI 1.2: Increase tax collection measured by the number of districts using automated revenue collection system
IRI 1.1 Intermediate Results Indicator 1: Hours per year spent paying taxes
PDO Indicator 2: Improved national and sub-national transparency and accountability in the use of public funds, measured by the percent of entities submitting monthly financial statements by due date
IRI 1.3 Percentage of active small and micro tax payers file taxes using e-tax portal, against number of active taxpayers (percentage)
IRI3.2 Annual labor market statistics collected and disseminated
IRI 2.2 Proportion of sub-districts (Sectors) using a simplified accounting and financial reporting appl
IRI 2-1. Proportion of MDAs receiving unqualified audit opinion (percent)
PDO Indicator 3: Share of MDAs using official statistics for both analysis of current developments
